text: Welcome to the Experiment! Today you will be taking part in a study that will involve 4 experimental components. Please click the “Next” button to proceed with the experiment guidelines.

The tasks you will be asked to complete in today’s session require that you pay close attention to specific task instructions so it is important that you try to minimize any distractions around you. Because we require all participants to have some basic knowledge of the experiment guidelines, we ask that you complete a short quiz first in order to be admitted to the experiment. You must answer all 3 quiz questions correctly in order to enter the experiment.

Feel free to take down notes or use the “Back” and “Next” buttons below to clarify any details that are unclear.

Note: Do not use the “back,” “forward,” or “refresh” buttons on your browser during this experiment as doing so will terminate the session.

If you are admitted into this experiment and complete all experimental sections, you will earn $7.50 in base payment. From our piloting of this study we estimate that this task will take you approximately 1 hour and 30 minutes to complete.

Note: If you do not have 1 hour and 30 minutes to complete this study we ask that you do not proceed.

Please feel free to take any resting breaks as necessary but we ask that you try to complete the task in under 2 hours. If you need to take a break part-way through the experiment, please do so during instruction blocks between experimental sections. You will also receive instruction prompts throughout the task that will indicate good stopping points for breaks.

In addition of the base payment you will also have the opportunity to earn bonus payment in this experiment. This study is comprised of 3 experimental components, all of which will give you the chance to earn bonus payment depending on the decisions you make.

At the end of up of the experiment a computer algorithm will randomly select one of the experimental sections you completed and will then select one trial you completed to determine your final bonus payment. You will be shown your final bonus payment at the end of the experiment and will be paid accordingly.
Please take a few minutes to review any experimental guidelines that may be unclear. If you have no further questions please complete the following quiz in order to be admitted into the experiment.
